declarations.comments:
Type synonym indicating the value should be an octet (0-255). If the value
provided is outside this range it will be used as modulo 255.
declarations.title: Octet

declarations.comments: Type synonym indicating the value refers to an offset in a buffer.
declarations.title: Offset

declarations.comments: An instance of Node's Buffer class.
declarations.title: Buffer

declarations.comments: Effect for buffer creation, reading, or writing.
declarations.title: BUFFER

declarations.comments: Enumeration of the numeric types that can be written to a buffer.
declarations.title: BufferValueType

declarations.comments: Creates a new buffer of the specified size.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Creates a new buffer from an array of octets, sized to match the array.
declarations.title: fromArray

declarations.comments:
Creates a new buffer from a string with the specified encoding, sized to
match the string.
declarations.title: fromString

declarations.comments: Reads a numeric value from a buffer at the specified offset.
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: Reads a section of a buffer as a string with the specified encoding.
declarations.title: readString

declarations.comments: Reads the buffer as a string with the specified encoding.
declarations.title: toString

declarations.comments: Writes a numeric value to a buffer at the specified offset.
declarations.title: write

declarations.comments:
Writes octets from a string to a buffer at the specified offset. Multi-byte
characters will not be written to the buffer if there is not enough capacity
to write them fully. The number of bytes written is returned.
declarations.title: writeString

declarations.comments: Creates an array of octets from a buffer's contents.
declarations.title: toArray

declarations.comments: Reads an octet from a buffer at the specified offset.
declarations.title: getAtOffset

declarations.comments: Writes an octet in the buffer at the specified offset.
declarations.title: setAtOffset

declarations.comments: Returns the size of a buffer.
declarations.title: size

declarations.comments: Concatenates a list of buffers.
declarations.title: concat

declarations.comments:
Concatenates a list of buffers, combining them into a new buffer of the
specified length.
declarations.title: concat'

declarations.comments:
Copies a section of a source buffer into a target buffer at the specified
offset, and returns the number of octets copied.
declarations.title: copy

declarations.comments: Fills a range in a buffer with the specified octet.
declarations.title: fill

declarations.comments:
Creates a new buffer slice that acts like a window on the original buffer.
Writing to the slice buffer updates the original buffer and vice-versa.
This is considered unsafe as writing to a slice can result in action at a
distance.
declarations.title: slice
